function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Imperfect fit and adherence of masks leading to decreased viral exposure","Impact":"Increased risk of infection in the population","Mitigation":"Promote proper mask-wearing behavior and education on mask fitting","Technologies":"Education and awareness campaigns, mask-fitting tools","People":"General population","Owner":"Health authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inefficient filtration of household materials used for masks and coverings","Impact":"Decreased protection for mask wearers","Mitigation":"Recommend the use of more efficient materials for mask making","Technologies":"Development of high-efficiency filtration materials, guidelines for material selection","People":"General population, mask manufacturers","Owner":"Health authorities, material scientists"},{"Description":"Lack of universal masking leading to increased cases and symptomatic infection manifestations","Impact":"Higher rates of severe illness and death in regions with inadequate mask-wearing","Mitigation":"Promote and enforce universal masking policies, provide subsidies for mask distribution","Technologies":"Mask distribution systems, enforcement technology (e.g., facial recognition for mask monitoring)","People":"General population, policymakers","Owner":"Governments, public health authorities"}]}
